   //Type appropriate comment here, and begin script below
	
	//al cargar oculto los campos del virtual server

	 g_form.setVisible('nombre_virtual_server_2',false);
	 g_form.setVisible('nombre_virtual_server_3',false);
	 g_form.setVisible('nombre_virtual_server_4',false);

	 g_form.setVisible('ip_virtual_server_2',false);
	 g_form.setVisible('ip_virtual_server_3',false);
	 g_form.setVisible('ip_virtual_server_4',false);
   
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2019-06-20 04:01:45</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>91ea00134fc63300c09fb8de9310c79a</sys_id><sys_mod_count>6</sys_mod_count><sys_name>ValorCeroHidePersistenceGroup</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="BCR_APP" source="x_287988_bcr_app">28f3b438db33230087d9d6aa48961993</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="BCR_APP">28f3b438db33230087d9d6aa48961993</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_91ea00134fc63300c09fb8de9310c79a</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>114190586</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-09-10 03:33:58</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onLoad</type><ui_type>0</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
